name: A Larger Reality 2.0
description:
Pre-Release!

A Larger Reality 2.0 is an anthology, edited by Libia Brenda, that includes 39 stories, 17 illustrations and 2 medias from 57 collaborators! Presented in both Spanish and English, showcasing a variety of talent, this antologhy is available for free as in “free speech,” not as in “free beer.” Download: appbook in Web App or Android App (itch.io or Google Play), ebook in EPUB or MOBI, or get it all!
